message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have less, I'll take more, it's just the beginning!
You're pushing too hard, let's meet in the middle!
I'll give you a bit more, but don't think it's a gift!
I'm willing to compromise, but don't expect me to give away the farm!
You're getting closer to my price, but I'm not there yet!
I'm getting tired of your games, let's get serious!
You're running out of time, and I'm running out of patience!
This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
You're really pushing your luck, but I'll give you one last chance!
This is my last chance, take it or we both get nothing!
It's now or never, Alice! Take it or we both walk away with nothing!
